name: Paperthin
description:
Paperthin is a randomly generated platformer focusing on replayability, harsh rogue-like aspects and smooth minimalistic gameplay.

This was a project I worked on and completed in 2013. Two years later with Update 1.2 I've given the game a fresh coat of paint.

- Improved graphics and animations
- Tweaked and balanced gameplay
- Reworked game mechanics
- A new extended and remastered soundtrack by the talented Nounverber


If you enjoy the soundtrack, you can visit Nounverber here:
http://www.nounverber.com/

You can also browse and purchase the soundtrack for only $3.99 USD here:
https://nounverber.bandcamp.com/album/paperthemes


--------------------------------------

"It's compact, but fun; it's polished in a way that many other games simply aren't. Pash may prove to become a reliable source of solid and stylish game concepts yet."

- indiestatik.com
